text.paragraph: Right wrist was placed in cast
Cast to be removed in 6 weeks

list.item: Right wrist was placed in cast

section.title: Plan of Care
section.text: Retain cast for 6 weeks. Exercise plan thereafter.

tr.td: To relieve acute symptoms while waiting treatment
To relieve acute symptom during trip to clinic

section.title: History of Present Illness
section.text: Patient fell while skating. Suspect fractured radius.

text.paragraph: Do not place on life support

section.title: Physical Examination
section.text: Right wrist shows swelling and is tender to the touch.
